text:
The star is now back home from the hospital and is recovering from her terrible health scare. Modern Family actress Sarah Hyland took to social media on Thursday night to share a pic on Insta Stories that showed her with a really swollen face and in the hospital, shocking fans.

She noted that she was ‘torn from work against my will’ when she was checked in on Monday.

Hyland did not mention her illness.

We know however that the star did undergo a kidney transplant back in 2012 after struggling with kidney dysplasia.

Last year she also revealed that her face is sometimes swollen from her life-saving medication, steroid Prednisone.

Today, one insider told People that: ‘Sarah had a scare and was hospitalized. It was scary, but thankfully she is better and is home.’

After her scare, Hyland misses her significant other, former Bachelorette contestant Wells Adams, who is currently in Mexico to shoot Bachelor in Paradise.

The two made it official towards the end of last year.

But Adams made sure to cheer on his girlfriend from far away by posting a pic of the two of them and captioning it: ‘I miss this one a lot…coming home soon baby!’

The actress screenshot his Insta Story writing: ‘Man, I miss my baby.’

In addition, early on Thursday, Hyland also responded to a joke Adams tweeted, so it looks like despite being away from each other, they are interacting as much as possible.

Advertisement

Adams, as well as Hyland’s family members and close friends, have been very supportive, and the actress is now ‘looking forward to getting back to work next week,’ the insider dished.
title: Sarah Hyland’s Boyfriend Wells Adams Cheers Her On From Afar After She Returns Home From The Hospital
